CustomField.formula: (Options_Price__c / QTY_Number__c) + (Sub_Options_Price__c / QTY_Number__c) + (AE_SB_Price__c / QTY_Number__c) + (HSS_Price__c / QTY_Number__c) + (Departure_Cities_Surcharge__c / QTY_Number__c) + (Post_Tour_StopOver_Price__c / QTY_Number__c) + Post_Tour_StopOver_Solo_Price__c + (Pre_Tour_StopOver_Price__c / QTY_Number__c) + Pre_Tour_StopOver_Solo_Price__c + Solo_Surcharge__c + (land_activity_price__c / QTY_Number__c)+ land_activity_solo_price__c+ (land_activity_a_price__c / QTY_Number__c)+ land_activity_a_solo_price__c
CustomField.label: Single Price
